p: In order to estimate the possible fate of known P. parlatorei populations sampled for genetic analyses, we assigned to each of the 24 selected populations the corresponding state of BIO 18 and BIO 10(D, O, C and C, O, H) for the modern and 2070 periods (RCP2.6 and RCP8.5). For this, we calculated a 10 km buffer area (approx. 400 pixels) around each population coordinate and assigned the most frequent state (D, O, C and C, O, H) to each population.
